summary: A new transfer student comes once again to a high school where violent fights among students is a way of life.
cast: Elly|Motoki Fukami|Masahiro Higashide|Suzu Hirose|Wataru Ichinose|Ryusuke Ito|Joey Iwanaga|Takanori Iwata|Ryô Katsuji|Kenzô|Shûichirô Masuda|Kento Nagayama|Taichi Saotome|Tsutomu Takahashi|Kyôsuke Yabe|Yûya Yagira
title: Crows 3
